profile: Forever Stone Design is dedicated to excellence.  We take pride in our work with over 25 years of experience in this field, client satisfaction is number one.  From designing a project to completing it, you can rest assured the client is always happy.  We specialize in all types of stone work ranging from natural stone walls, flagstone, interlock, steps, pillars, waterfalls, retaining walls.  If you can imagine it, we can create it.

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.ca for all your renovation needs

profile: As a family owned and operated business, The Marble Clinic has over 30 years experience in the field of natural stone protection and restoration - and with that experience our highly knowledgeable staff is able to provide the best outcome for your natural stone. Specializing in the fields of protection, restoration as well as maintenance. Each project has individual needs and The Marble Clinics team of experts work to produce top quality results. We offer the following services: Marble Cleaning: Remove dirt and dust stuck in the stone surface or in the grout lines – this will not remove scratches or etching alone. Wax Stripping: The use of wax and topical coatings can damage natural stone over time, and causes yellowing after short periods of heavy traffic; The Marble Clinic can remove topical coatings from any natural stone to prepare it for proper restoration and sealing techniques. Stone Grinding: This is the most common restoration technique and will remove deep scratches, lippage, etching, white stun marks and yellowing. It is also used to remove epoxy from chip and crack repairs. Marble Polishing: Through mechanical polishing methods, natural stone acquires a high lustre and reflects natural light – it therefore does not need topical coatings or wax to achieve a desired shine. Marble Honing: Will remove minor etching on low lustre stone surfaces, and give the surface a clean uniform finish without the polished look. Finish Alteration: The Marble Clinic can change the appearance of a natural stones finish; from honed to polished, polished to honed, and everything in-between. Countertop Seam-Polishing: Visible counter top seams can be filled with epoxy based resins, ground and polished or honed to match the stone colour and virtually disappear. Chip and Crack Repair: Chips and cracks in any natural stone can be filled with coloured epoxy resin and refinished to match the surrounding material. Grout Cleaning and Sealing: Over time grout accumulates dirt and becomes quite dirty. Grout can be cleaned and sealed to improve the floors beauty and facilitate easier maintenance cleaning. Grout Colouring: An easy way to change the look and feel of a tile floor. Stone Sealing: All natural stone should be professionally cleaned and sealed to increase the longevity of the material and repel dark staining solutions. Colour Enhancing: Using enhancing impregnators on flamed or textured material is an excellent way to protect your stone and bring it back to life. Table Repair: Our expert technicians can repair most tables, mantals, fireplace’s, statues or fountains – so long as it is a relatively clean break. Stone Maintenance: Specially formulated compounds used on an annual or semi-annual basis keep any surface in high traffic areas looking good year round.

profile:
Trust, transparency, affordability and a detailed understanding of our trade has made The Brothers Flooring leading residential and commercial installers. Our expertise has taken us all over Canada, but our nationwide reputation has not compromised our core values.

At heart, we’re a family business and we’re proud to be the go-to residential and commercial flooring contractors for Mississauga and the Greater Toronto Area since 2002. From small residential projects and renovations to luxury custom home enhancements and businesses, our skilled flooring specialists can help you realize your perfect flooring solution.

Family operated  with the passion of creating something on Our  own, We  developed Focus On Flooring and General Contracting. With many years of experience and a keen eye for details, we carefully picked our  team of Contractors .

Helping local homeowners achieve their goals is one of Our motivations for growing business. Along with experiencing Our client’s appreciation and happiness at the completion of each project.

Remodeling houses and creating  at home ambiance for Our  clients has always been a long-term goal of Focus on Flooring . With Our  growing team of professionals,  We were not only been able to accomplish that but surpassed Our expectations.

With over 15 years of experience in the industry and running a successful business; this gives our clients peace of mind, and You can be sure that You’re in good hands.

Please come visit our showroom! For the convenience of our dear clients our showroom is full of flooring that meet your lifestyle.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
JBG Tile & Contracting Ltd has opened a new flooring showroom selling the best materials from local distributors as well as importing our own line of ceramics. You can now buy your tile from the same company that will install it, one-stop convenient shopping for your renovation project.


Call today for a private appointment with Loreto Scarola to discuss, plan and choose your tile purchase and installation project.


JBGTile & Contracting was chosen as the only floor installer in a Platinum Leadership Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) project in Ontario, an Eco-friendly project that works off the philosophy of promoting green building design, construction, and operations.


Our company is a team of professionals providing and installing quality flooring and ceramics to builders, homeowners and commercial customers alike. 


Our product line includes flooring installation, bathroom renovations, design, leveling subfloors, waterproofing, shower floors, tile repairs, floor/bathroom demolition, backsplashes, levitate office installation service.

We specialize in quality home improvement, renovation and remodeling including bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, kitchen renovation and heating and cooling. Our professional team consisting of operating and project management, in-house trades, licensed plumbers, electricians, HVAC technicians and renovation specialists enable us to fulfill our clients’ needs within the budget and timelines with precision, clarity, a unique understanding of the design-build process.'

profile:
Precise Tile and Contracting Inc is a tile installation company located in Stouffville, Ontario, and has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 25 years. We are committed to providing top quality tile installation services at competitive pricing.
 
Precise Tile and Contracting tile installation services include tile flooring, backsplashes, shower stalls, entryways, fireplaces, accent walls, and other custom tile design.  Majority of the areas we assist in include but are not limited to kitchens, bathroom and shower tiling, entryway, sunroom, and the basement of your residence. We also offer tile installation in the greater Toronto area for commercial and retail spaces such as restaurants, retail stores, commercial offices, and many other commercial and retail businesses.
 
Precise Tile offers professional tile installation services for ceramic, porcelain, slate, marble, granite, glass tile, stainless steel, bamboo, and many more.  Whether it’s mosaic tile, subway tile or you are looking for a pattern design within your tiles, Precise Tile is your best choice for tile installation.

Call us for a free quote today at 416-999-8453!

profile:
Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd. is well known in the greater Toronto area and has a great reputation as a quality builder.  High quality workmanship is very important to us, no shortcuts are taken that will compromise the end result.  We are responsible for your final product and as our history has shown, we look after and service what we build.
Your Home is your greatest asset.  Our clients expect the highest level of personal attention and the finest quality construction delivered on time and for a price that undercuts the competition.  We make it our business to exceed our customer's expectations with over 30 years of experience.
With careful planning and the assistance of Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd., most untapped spaces can be turned into attractive, comfortable living areas.  Whatever the home improvement or renovation project you may have, Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd. will execute your need with a professional design.
 
Call us toll-free at 1-888-491-7612
services:
Other Services Q.E.W. Contracting provides:
- Painting.
- Railings.
- Asphalt driveways.
- Plumbing: rough-ins, toilet, vanity, shower control(all work done by a licensed plumber).
- Seamless glass enclousres.
- Garages.
- Electrical: re-wire, pot lights, ceiling fans, electrical panels, outlets/switches (all work done by a licenced electrician).
- Awnings.
- Shingled roofing.
- Tiling (kitchen, bathroom, laundry room, etc.).
- Flooring installation (ceramic tiles, hardwood, laminate, engineered wood, carpeting).
- Drywall.
- HVAC: fireplace installations.
- Carpentry: trim, baseboards, casings, custom millwork, etc.
specialities:
Q.E.W. Contracting specializes in the following:
- All types of natural stone:  walkways, porch/stair overlays, patios, pool surrounds.
- Natural flagstone repairs.
- Partial or total kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations.
- Eavestrough, soffits, fascia, leaf guards and siding.
- Replacement doors and windows.
- Waterproofing (interior/exterior).

Seasonal Specialities:
- Patio rebuilding.
- Interlock and paver stones.
- Retaining garden walls.

profile:
Stone contractors group has a proven track record of excellence in designing and managing several residential construction projects in the Greater Toronto area, including historic restoration, stone and brick pointing, and any other masonry services project. No matter the size of your project, our experienced professional masons at Stone Contractors Group will plan, design, construct, and maintain your masonry restoration project and repairs across Toronto and Mississauga including all the GTA

***

Effective planning is crucial to the successful completion of any masonry or historic restoration project we perform, including all brick restoration work and stone restoration work in the Toronto area and Mississauga area.

*** 

Before starting the project, our team of experts will first assess your goals. Then we provide you with an estimate and timeline for completion. From beginning to end, you will be involved every step of the way with full-service, qualified masons who are highly skilled brick pointers and historic renovators who have countless jobs under their belt.

***

Our Services Include: 

Interior and Exterior Services:
Existing Masonry Reinforcements
